attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Duchess is a prolific top contributor troll within the uk yahoo answers community who targets over members with email hate campaigns, derogatory lists, and spam. I hereby petition the government of the united kingdom to take action that yahoo answers seem incapable or unwilling to take against all her accounts and suspend them.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
